comment.author: 96835261@N04
comment._content: Picture was taken by Paul M. Lewis working for the Potomac News.

comment.author: 100263009@N04
comment._content: This is not the Rt. 1 bridge.  This was the "Iron Bridge" that was part of VA 123.  It was replaced with a temporary wooden bridge erected by the Army and then replaced with the present bridge several years later.

comment.author: 96835261@N04
comment._content: Ajohnward is right this is not the Rt. 1 bridge.
